video.title: キルラキル
video.synopsis: The "woman with the scissor blade" -- Ryuko Matoi -- searches for clues all around the world for the truth behind her father's death.

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko arrives at Honnouji Academy, where tyrannical Satsuki and her loyal underlings, the Elite Four, have the academy under their absolute control.
episodes.title: If Only I Had Thorns Like a Thistle…

episodes.synopsis: Weakened by a battle, Ryuko flees the academy before collapsing in the street. After being rescued, she returns and faces off against Omiko Hakodate.
episodes.title: So Sexy She Might Pass Out

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko learns the secret behind the power of Senketsu and the Goku Uniforms. Meanwhile, Satsuki Kiryuin returns home to claim a power of her own.
episodes.title: Junketsu

episodes.synopsis: Sirens awaken the No-Star students for the start of "No-Late Day," where being tardy will get you expelled from Honnouji Academy.
episodes.title: Dawn of a Miserable Morning

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious man arrives at Honnouji Academy and quickly proves himself capable of fighting a Two-Star Goku Uniform. Now he's set his sights on Ryuko.
episodes.title: Trigger

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by recent events, Ryuko demands answers from her homeroom teacher, Aikuro Mikisugi. Uzu Sanageyama challenges Ryuko to a duel.
episodes.title: Don’t Toy Me On a Whim

episodes.synopsis: After defeating another group of clubs, Ryuko notices that her opponents are becoming more and more absurd.
episodes.title: A Loser I Can't Hate

episodes.synopsis: Satsuki Kiryuin reveals her plan to rebuild Honnouji Academy's order, a free-for-all whose survivors will be able to regain their Goku Uniforms.
episodes.title: I'll Wipe My Own Tears

episodes.synopsis: The final round of Honnouji Academy's Naturals Election is about to begin, and each of the Elite Four wants to be the first to fight Ryuko.
episodes.title: A Once in a Lifetime Chance

episodes.synopsis: The second battle against the Elite Four begins. How will Ryuko defeat Houka Inumuta, who's using the data he's collected to predict her every move?
episodes.title: I Want to Know More About You

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko's battle against the Elite Four takes to the skies. But who is the mysterious girl strolling through town, and what secrets does she hold?
episodes.title: I'm Not Your Cute Woman

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko finally faces her father's killer, but can she contain her rage? Mako and the Elite Four watch as Ryuko rampages on, inching closer to death.
episodes.title: Spit Your Sadness Away

episodes.synopsis: Honnouji Academy is mobilizing for the Tri-City Schools Raid Trip. But after her recent rampage, Ryuko is moping in bed, unwilling to fight.
episodes.title: Crazy For You

episodes.synopsis: The Tri-City Schools Raid Trip has commenced! But what part will Ryuko be able to play, with Senketsu in the hands of the enemy?
episodes.title: Ride Like the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Satsuki Kiryuin joins the front line of Osaka to battle Kaneo Takarada, the heir to the Takarada Conglomerate. Takarada rallies the locals to fight.
episodes.title: Don't Stop Me Now

episodes.synopsis: The Tri-City Schools Raid Trip is returning to Honnouji Academy. Ryuko learns the truth behind the events that brought her and Senketsu together.
episodes.title: The Girl Can't Help It

episodes.synopsis: Preparations are underway for the Honnouji Academy Cultural & Sports Grand Festival. But what are Ragyo and Satsuki's real intentions for the event?
episodes.title: Tell Me Why

episodes.synopsis: The Honnouji Academy Cultural and Sports Grand Festival comes to an abrupt and unexpected conclusion. Ryuko must decide who is friend and who is foe.
episodes.title: Into the Night

episodes.synopsis: A startling revelation turns Ryuko's world upside down, but she's not the only one in turmoil.
episodes.title: Raindrops Keep Falling On My Head

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko is awake, and she's not happy. Intent on killing Ragyo and Nui, Ryuko heads out, leaving her allies behind.
episodes.title: Far from the Madding Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Ryuko's rampage continues, and thanks to Ragyo and Nui, she has an unexpected new ally. Can the Elite Four and Nudist beach withstand the onslaught?
episodes.title: Incomplete

episodes.synopsis: A surprising turn of events catches Nui Harime off guard, giving Nudist Beach a chance to regroup and plan their next step in the fight against Ragyo.
episodes.title: Tell Me How You Feel

episodes.synopsis: The ongoing battle presses towards Honnouji Academy, but Ragyo and the Original Life Fiber stand in the way. Ryuko and Satsuki set off to face them.
episodes.title: Imitation Gold

episodes.synopsis: The final confrontation is at hand. Will Ragyo and Nui bring on the end of the world, or will Ryuko and the others be able to stop them?
episodes.title: Past the Infinite Darkness
